content: lily cowl copyright © 2020 www throughthestitch com page 1 of 6 lily cowl the pattern and photographs contained in this document are property of through the stitch this pattern is available for personal use only they are the property of through the stitch and are purchased under the agreement that the patterns and photographs cannot be distributed copied in part or in whole re-written or re-sold without permission if you need any help with my patterns please do not hesitate to contact me throughthestitch@gmail com copyright © 2020 copyright © 2020 www throughthestitch com page 2 of 6 lily cowl cowl sizes teen size adult size the cowl on the photo is adult size cowl height 20 24 cm or 8 9 5 inches cowl width 25 29 cm or 10 11 5 inches materials  yarn pronto by mondial 100% acrylic anti pilling 87 100 gr approx 103 118 m or 113 129 yards  a pair of 8mm u s 11 circular needles 60cm 24 inches length  a stitch marker points the beginning of the round on the circular knitting  a tapestry needle to weave in the yarn ends copyright © 2020 www throughthestitch com page 3 of 6 lily cowl g a u g e 12 sts and 16 row =10x10cm 4x4 inches in stockinette stitch needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm 4 inches change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm 4 inches change to a smaller needle size abbreviations  k knit  p purl cowl using 8mm u s 11 straight needles cast on 60 70 sts join in the round copyright © 2020 www throughthestitch com page 4 of 6 lily cowl row 1 knit all stitches row 2 knit all stitches row 3 *k1 p1* row 4 *k1 p1* row 5 knit all stitches row 6 knit all stitches row 7 *p1 k1* row 8 *p1 k1* repeat the above 8 row until piece length measures 20 24 cm or 8 9 5 inches bind off all stitches knitwise copyright © 2020 www throughthestitch com page 5 of 6 lily cowl copyright © 2020 www throughthestitch com page 6 of 6
